Articles.Content:
Greetings,

Found KSP surfing around some forums looking for a new Simulation type game, and i am extremely glad that I stumbled upon it. I have been playing around with the stock parts and some mods that were posted here. Been trying to use Blender to make a mod of my own, any tips or hints would be appreciated. ( Blender seems to have a very steep learning curve) Anyhow, enough of my rambling See you in Space!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
You can find plenty of assistance in the mod section of the forum, there are quite a few like you and they are ready to help.
